nodes.text: Wargame simulation 7-3A was a combat simulation used by the Imperial Military of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. The scenario simulating the fighting on the Novare Coast on the planet Denova, where combatants from each team would attempt to take control of artillery emplacements in order to destroy the enemy's shielded bunker. Lethal firepower was authorized during the scenario.

The wargame simulation serves as the in-universe explanation as to why two Imperial teams would be fighting each other in the Novare Coast Warzone in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is mentioned by the announcer during the 90-second waiting period before the match begins.
